scripts.db:psql: docker exec -it polls-db psql -U polls -d polls
scripts.db:dump: bash -lc 'docker exec -i polls-db pg_dump -U polls -d polls > ./.data/dump.sql'
scripts.db:restore: bash -lc 'cat ./.data/dump.sql | docker exec -i polls-db psql -U polls -d polls'
scripts.db:test:psql: docker exec -it polls-db-test psql -U polls -d polls_test
scripts.prisma:gen: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:init: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:deploy: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:reset: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma migrate reset --force --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:seed: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:studio: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- prisma studio --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:test:deploy: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:test:seed: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma db seed --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.be:dev: pnpm --dir backend exec dotenv -e .env -- tsx src/server.ts
